pages.text: Simple, yet ravenous creatures, these giant arthopods can be great assets in combat.
The following texts will detail the variants of spiders a Spider Nest can train.
The basic Spider found in the dark, only loyal towards you. Does whatever a Spider a can.
A smaller and venomous subspecies of Spiders. Wearing Wild Robes will make these spiders inflict Acid Venom instead of regular Poison.

Unlike their brutish counterparts, Web Spiders would not immediately attack their foes, but instead shoot a ball of web that, when hit, entangles them for a while, where upon they will rush towards them at high speed.
An bone covered spider that shoots Bone Shards at their foes from afar, only going onto melee if their target is close.
